IN THE SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA AREA
NO TRAFFIC RESTRICTIONS ARE REPORTED FOR THIS AREA. 
###
IN THE CENTRAL CALIFORNIA AREA
A HIGH WIND ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT FROM THE LOS ANGELES-KERN COUNTY LINE TO THE KINGS-FRESNO COUNTY LINE - TRAVEL IS NOT RECOMMENDED FOR CAMPERS, TRAILERS OR PERMIT LOADS . 
###
IN THE NORTHERN CALIFORNIA AREA
NO TRAFFIC RESTRICTIONS ARE REPORTED FOR THIS AREA.
